original_title: New Yorkers back Mamdani's affordability-focused mayoral campaign | Fox News
article_summary: New Yorkers are supporting Democratic mayoral nominee Zohran Mamdani due to his focus on affordability and progressive policies, such as free buses, child care, and city-run grocery stores. Voters like Ian, Ritvik, and Noah are drawn to Mamdani's vision of making New York City more affordable for regular people and his message of unity.</s>
